titleStmt.title: A true relation of Englands happinesse, vnder the raigne of Queene Elizabeth and the miserable estate of papists, vnder the Popes tyrany / by M.S.
titleStmt.author: Sutcliffe, Matthew, 1550?-1629.

notesStmt.note: Bk. 3 has caption title: The third booke, of the answer to Robert Parsons his supernodical Warn-word ...
Earlier version published in 1604 under title: A ful and round answer to N.D. alias Robert Parsons ...
Place of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Errors in paging: p. 344-345 and 348-349 misnumbered 348-349 and 351-352 respectively.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
